Catalog Managers can create, update and delete templates from your corporate catalog.

changeManagers.label: Change Managers

You can select up to 50 change managers

description.short: SalesTim is an adoption and governance engine for Microsoft Teams.

profile.id: User: ID (Unique Azure AD identifier as a UUID)

groups.direct: Groups: All the groups that the user is a DIRECT member of.

uniqueId.uuid: Unique ID: A unique ID randomly generated as a UUID. e.g: '42e3c9b3-6040-4a73-8a43-50eaa01572c0'
